title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync error
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync error. The issue occurs when exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported JAR file in the same directory (project). An out of sync message is displayed when attempting to overwrite the exported JAR file for the second time.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported JAR file in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when attempting to overwrite the exported JAR file for the second time.
EB: The exported JAR file should be overwritten without triggering an out of sync error.
SR:
PA (8/17/01 2:03:29 PM): 

1. Export a directory (project).
2. Place the exported JAR file in the same directory (project).
3. Attempt to overwrite the exported JAR file for the second time.

Expected behavior: The exported JAR file should be overwritten without triggering an out of sync error.
